4d50f2f1-9d32-43e7-a715-4af79c52c329.description: The earner of this badge has been verified and accepted into the Jungal platform. They have demonstrated skill, customer focus and an enduring commitment to their own career so as to be recognised as a high performance freelancer. The earner of this badge operates to a Jungal Gigstar Code of Conduct and set of standards that promotes integrity and professionalism.
4d50f2f1-9d32-43e7-a715-4af79c52c329.name: Verified Gigstar

alignments.name: Gigstar Code of Conduct
alignments.description: Jungal Gigstars operate to an agreed and published set of principles and standards to capture the essence of operating well in the gig economy. They offer great skill, insight and performance to clients and in return enjoy freedom of work and lifestyle all covered by professional standards. Gigstars are independent freelancers with passion.

badge_template_activities.title: The earner of this badge has been fully verified by the Jungal platform team in a face to face or human equivalent method to ensure the earner is who they say they are and possesses the skills and capabilities set out within the platform. The earner has been granted a two year membership and has agreed to operate in this collegiate and high performance community in a manner that is consistent with the group's values, integrity and commitment to our clients and themselves.

4c50165f-885e-4989-bcdd-e4345fce9af6.description: This badge is awarded to attendees who have successfully completed our Effective Business Writing Masterclass and have learnt to craft clear, concise, and impactful business communications. On completion and taking your writing skills to the next level, you can display your badge proudly on your LinkedIn profile and showcase your expertise to potential employers and clients.
4c50165f-885e-4989-bcdd-e4345fce9af6.name: Effective Business Writing Masterclass

badge_template_activities.title: The bearer of this badge has attended45 minutes of professional development in the areas of Effective Business Writing. This is useful for communication and workplace efficiency.

77884b1e-0555-4423-af97-3884129f7bd2.description: This badge has been awarded to the earner based on their involvement in the creation of The Jungal platform. This badge signifies the exceptional teamwork, patience and talent of the earner in operating in a new venture and directly contributing to the production of this innovative global platform. A very limited number of original badges have been issued to the original team.
77884b1e-0555-4423-af97-3884129f7bd2.name: Original Jungal Team

badge_template_activities.title: The earner of this unique badge has demonstrated strong team work, professional conduct and a capacity to work in the realm of creativity and commercial delivery.  This earner can claim to be a part of The Jungal historic creation process and may have contributed their skills in technology, marketing, legals, finance, content, verification or team management. This is the badge of a proven start up team member who possesses verified hands on experience.

f7627ad9-145c-470f-a774-f834ee2660e8.description: The owner of this badge has attended an online masterclass explaining the key aspects of journey mapping and the role of an exceptional persona construct. The session is advanced and the attendee has brought a background of lean, process management and customer experience to the session and then applied the presented knowledge of segmentation and targeted transformation
f7627ad9-145c-470f-a774-f834ee2660e8.name: Journey Mapping and Persona Workshop

badge_template_activities.title: The bearer of this badge has attend one hour of professional development in the areas of analysis and customer journey mapping. This is useful for staff experience mapping and journeys being created for staff.

3ca74925-b3b6-46aa-ae82-950010f3ff48.description: The earner of this badge has been verified and accepted into the Jungal platform. They have demonstrated skill, customer focus and an enduring commitment to their own career so as to be recognised as a high performance freelancer and one that has performed an act of volunteer work. The earner of this badge operates to a Jungal Gigstar Code of Conduct and set of standards that promotes integrity and professionalism.
3ca74925-b3b6-46aa-ae82-950010f3ff48.name: Verified Gigstar Intern
